data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pezzini, Cleder, Zilch, Kassia Cristina Freire, Koehler, Andreas (2014): A new species of Dendrocerus (Hymenoptera, Megaspilidae) from southern Brazil. ZooKeys 425: 51-57, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.425.7454, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.425.7454
